body_html: It seems tesnsorflow right now does not support general sparse matrix yet. Will probably have to convert each mini-batch data into dense matrix but that will make matrix vector operation much slower..
body_text: It seems tesnsorflow right now does not support  general sparse matrix yet. Will probably have to convert each mini-batch data into dense matrix but that will make matrix vector operation much slower..
body: It seems tesnsorflow right now does not support  general sparse matrix yet. Will probably have to convert each mini-batch data into dense matrix but that will make matrix vector operation much slower..
